name: Dark - The Scary Horror Game
description:
The Horror Game is a new addictive sneaky game that will keep you playing for hours nonstop! Your main objective is to get out of the scary house as fast as you can. But, you will have to be very careful because has locked you in the house . Sounds easy? Would you be able to escape from the dark house without attracting the attention of the any people in in this creepy and scary horror game?
So,what you are waiting for - Download now dark home The Horror Game now and try to escape from the haunted house
